plot outline: Samrat, an addict sees himself wearing a sunglass over the mirror whereas, in reality, he is not wearing any sunglass. He is shocked to find out that the people he is seeing everywhere, all of them are wearing sunglasses. Upon consulting a doctor, he learns that these side effects that he is facing. But he is yet to confront a ghastly truth of himself.
title: Sunglass
plot: Samrat, an addict sees himself wearing a sunglass over the mirror whereas, in reality, he is not wearing any sunglass. He is shocked to find out that the people he is seeing everywhere, all of them are wearing sunglasses. Upon consulting a doctor, he learns that these side effects that he is facing. But he is yet to confront a ghastly truth of himself.
